Detailed Description

Class for maintain a set of registered nodes and their associated node information. Provides basic CRUD functionality

Member Function Documentation

bool oryx_diagnostics::NodeManager::checkId ( int  node_id) const throw (NoMatchingNodeId) [private]

A Map of node_id's to their respective NodeInformationContainer data.

Checks to make sure that a given node_id exists in the NodeManager's node_map

Parameters:
node_idThe node_id to use as a key to check for
Returns:
TRUE if the key is in the map, else false
Exceptions:
NoMatchingNodeIdif the node_id is not in the map

Parameters:
[in]node_idThe node_id to touch
Exceptions:
NoMatchingNodeIdif the given node_id was not registered with the system

int oryx_diagnostics::NodeManager::registerNode ( const std::string &  node_name,
const std::string &  node_type,
int  criticality,
int  heartbeat_rate,
int  heartbeat_tolarence 
) throw (NonUniqueNodeName)

Registers a new node with the NodeManager

Parameters:
[in]node_nameThe unique ROS name for a node
[in]node_typeThe non-unique type of the node
[in]criticalityThe criticality for the node
[in]heartbeat_rateThe heartbeat rate for the node, in Hz
[in]heartbeat_toleranceThe tolerance amount for the node, in Hz
Returns:
The unique node_id for the newly registered node

Definition at line 22 of file NodeManager.cpp.

void oryx_diagnostics::NodeManager::timeCheck ( result_map &  results,
ros::Time &  checkTime 
) const

Checks to see if the nodes in the NodeManager have been touched recently enough to pass their heartbeat rate within their specified tolerence

Parameters:
[out]resultsA reference to an empty result_map to write the results into
[in]checkTimeThe time to compare against

The results map will be filled with check_results as values, and keyed by node_id. The first item in the check_result is a bool, which will be true if it passed its heartbeat rate test. The second item is an int, an corrisponds to the criticality of that node

NoMatchingNodeIdif the given node_id was not registered with the system
